title: The current state of Mundo sickens me

replies.body: Guys stop crying about Mundo it's the 5th thread I see tonight about this his winrate is 51% like come on he's been under 50% for the last many patches.
If people want to complain, let them
No, It's annoying.
And what can you do about it?
Downvote, comment, report if the thread contains blasphemy. Why are you asking?
And that is going to accomplish literally nothing. The threads will still exist and continue to be created regardless of what you do.

> And that is going to accomplish literally nothing. The threads will still exist and continue to be created regardless of what you do.

Exactly! And Downvoting won't help if it's only you. Same with Reporting, and Commenting will only get you in trouble tbh
Two words- Grievous Wounds. Every champion can build it and some have it built in
despite that his winrate was still apparently 50% which is balanced

You think grievous wounds stops mundo now? xD Literally you have to build that to counter him to have 100% of his former strength when it is applied...

> Balance team Rioter 1 "Nah Mundo only has a 50% win rate in all elos he needs a buff"

Except his win rate will go up as people actually learn how to play him and he isn't banned in over half the games.
